page.title: List of people convicted of high treason in England before 1 May 1707

revisions.rev:
{{Unreferenced|date=March 2009}} {{main|List of people convicted of treason}}
This is a list of people convicted of [[High treason in the United Kingdom|high treason]] in the [[Kingdom of England]] before the Union with Scotland on 1 May 1707. It does not include people convicted of [[petty treason]].
==Chronological list==
'''1283''' *[[Dafydd ap Gruffydd]], Prince of Wales
'''1305''' *[[William Wallace]]
'''1495''' *[[William Stanley (Battle of Bosworth)|Sir William Stanley]]
'''1499''' *[[Edward Plantagenet, 17th Earl of Warwick]] *[[Perkin Warbeck]]
'''1521''' *[[Edward Stafford, 3rd Duke of Buckingham]]
'''1535''' *[[Thomas More]], [[Lord Chancellor]]
'''1536 - Anne Boleyn, etc.''' *[[Anne Boleyn]], Queen *[[George Boleyn, Viscount Rochford]] *[[William Brereton (groom)|Sir William Brereton]] *[[Mark Smeaton]] *[[Henry Norris (courtier)|Sir Henry Norris]] *Sir [[Francis Weston]] '''1537 - Pilgrimage of Grace''' *[[Robert Aske (political leader)|Sir Robert Aske]] '''1541 - Catherine Howard, etc.''' *[[Catherine Howard]], Queen *[[Thomas Culpeper]] *[[Francis Dereham]]
'''1549 - Kett's Rebellion'''
Persons convicted for their involvement in [[Kett's Rebellion]]: *[[Robert Kett]]
'''1553'''
'''Jane Grey, etc.''' *[[John Dudley, 1st Duke of Northumberland]] *[[Lady Jane Grey]]
'''1554''' - '''[[Wyatt's Rebellion]]''' *[[William Thomas (scholar)|William Thomas]] *[[Henry Grey, 1st Duke of Suffolk]]
'''1572 - Ridolfi plot'''
See [[Ridolfi plot]]: *[[Thomas Howard, 4th Duke of Norfolk]]
'''1586 - Babington plot'''
Fourteen individuals were executed for their involvement in the [[Babington plot]]. Person convicted include: *[[Anthony Babington (nobleman)|Sir Anthony Babington]] *[[Mary, Queen of Scots]] *[[Chidiock Tichborne]]
'''1601 - Essex Rebellion''' *[[Robert Devereux, 2nd Earl of Essex]] *[[Henry Wriothesley, 3rd Earl of Southampton]]
'''1603 - Main plot'''
Persons convicted for their involvement in the [[Main Plot]] include: *[[Henry Brooke, 11th Baron Cobham]] *[[Thomas Grey, 15th Baron Grey de Wilton]] *Sir [[Walter Raleigh]], executed 1618
'''1605 - Gunpowder plot''' *[[Guy Fawkes]] *[[Thomas Wintour]] or Winter
'''1649''' *[[Charles I of England|Charles I, King of England, Scotland and Ireland]]
'''Regicides of Charles I'''
See [[List of regicides of Charles I]]
'''Tonge plot'''
'''1680 - Popish Plot'''
Persons implicated in the alleged [[Popish Plot]]: *[[William Howard, 1st Viscount Stafford]]
'''1683 - Rye House Plot'''
Those convicted in relation to the [[Rye House Plot]] include: *[[William Russell, Lord Russell]] *[[Elizabeth Gaunt]]
{{Expand list|date=March 2009}}
==Alphabetical list==
'''A'''
'''B''' *[[Anthony Babington]] (1586) ([[Babington Plot]]) *[[Anne Boleyn]], Queen (1536) *[[George Boleyn, Viscount Rochford]] (1536) *[[William Brereton (groom)|Sir William Brereton]] (1536) *[[Henry Brooke, 11th Baron Cobham]] (1603) ([[Main Plot]])
'''C''' *[[Charles I of England|Charles I, King of England, Scotland and Ireland]] (1649) *[[Thomas Culpeper]] (1541)
'''D''' *[[Francis Dereham]] (1541) *[[Robert Devereux, 2nd Earl of Essex]] (1601) ([[Essex Rebellion]]) *[[John Dudley, 1st Duke of Northumberland]] (1553)
'''E'''
'''F''' *[[Guy Fawkes]] (1605) ([[Gunpowder Plot]])
'''G''' *[[Elizabeth Gaunt]] (1685) ([[Rye House Plot]]) *[[Henry Grey, 1st Duke of Suffolk]] (1554) ([[Wyatt's Rebellion]]} *[[Lady Jane Grey]] *[[Thomas Grey, 15th Baron Grey de Wilton]] (1603) ([[Main Plot]]) *[[Dafydd ap Gruffydd]], Prince of Wales (1283)
'''H''' *[[Catherine Howard]], Queen (1541) *[[Thomas Howard, 4th Duke of Norfolk]] (1572) ([[Ridolfi Plot]]) *[[William Howard, 1st Viscount Stafford]] (1680) ([[Popish Plot]])
'''I'''
'''J'''
'''K''' *[[Robert Kett]] (1549) ([[Kett's Rebellion]]/[[Norfolk rebellion]])
'''L'''
'''M''' *[[Thomas More]], [[Lord Chancellor]] (1535)
'''N''' *[[Henry Norris (courtier)|Sir Henry Norris]] (1536)
'''O'''
'''P''' *[[Edward Plantagenet, 17th Earl of Warwick]] (1499)
'''Q'''
'''R''' *Sir [[Walter Raleigh]] (1603, executed 1618) ([[Main Plot]]) *[[William Russell, Lord Russell]] (1683) ([[Rye House Plot]])
'''S''' *[[Mark Smeaton]] (1536) *[[Edward Stafford, 3rd Duke of Buckingham]] (1521) *[[William Stanley (Battle of Bosworth)|Sir William Stanley]] (1495) *[[Mary, Queen of Scots|Mary Stuart, Queen of Scots]] (1586) ([[Babington Plot]])
'''T''' *[[William Thomas (scholar)|William Thomas]] (1554) ([[Wyatt's rebellion]]) *[[Chidiock Tichborne]] (1586) ([[Babington Plot]])
'''W''' *[[William Wallace]] (1305) *[[Perkin Warbeck]] (1499) *Sir [[Francis Weston]] (1536) *[[Thomas Wintour]] or Winter (1605) ([[Gunpowder Plot]]) *[[Henry Wriothesley, 3rd Earl of Southampton]] (1601) ([[Essex Rebellion]])
{{Expand list|date=March 2009}}
